raiseClaim.title: Raise a Claim
raiseClaim.success: Your claim has been submitted successfully!

items.title: New Safety Measures Introduced for Travelers
items.summary: Compass Point Assist rolls out new safety protocols for individuals visiting high-risk zones.

items.title: Humanitarian Access Expanded in Eastern Ukraine
items.summary: Agencies report better access to affected communities, improving support delivery.

items.title: Ukraine Travel Advisory Updated
items.summary: Foreign offices adjust travel guidance based on latest geopolitical developments.

insuranceForm.riskZoneDaysTooltip: Select the number of days you'll be traveling based on your destination's risk level.

insuranceForm.riskZoneDays: Select days based on Risk Zone
insuranceForm.validationcoverageOr: Please select either Emergency Medical Coverage or Personal Accident (PA) Coverage, or both.
insuranceForm.validationzoneDaysSum: Green Zone Days + Amber Zone Days + Red Zone Days must equal Total Days.
insuranceForm.travelEndDateAfterStart: Travel End Date must be after Travel Start Date.
insuranceForm.greenZoneDaysRequired: Green Zone Days is required. Enter 0 if none.
insuranceForm.greenZoneDaysInvalid: Green zone days must be at least 0.

ageLimit.title: Age Limit
ageLimit.description: We do not cover individuals aged 70 or older. If you still wish to proceed with an inquiry, please contact membership@compasspoint-assist.com.

primaryCitiesRegionsUkraine.empty: Please select at least one city.
primaryCitiesRegionsUkraine.required: Please select at least one city.

validation.consentForAdditionalRequired: You must confirm you have consent from the travellers.

birthdate.required: Traveller Date of Birth is required.

passportExpiry.format: Passport Expiry Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format.
passportExpiry.future: Passport Expiry Date must be in the future.

traveller.atLeastOne: At least one traveller is required.

tripEndDate.greater: Travel End Date must be after Travel Start Date.

green.required: Green Zone Days is required. Enter 0 if none.
green.min: Green zone days must be at least 0.

amber.required: Amber Zone Days is required. Enter 0 if none.
amber.min: Amber zone days must be at least 0.

red.required: Red Zone Days is required. Enter 0 if none.
red.min: Red zone days must be at least 0.

birthdate.format: Date of Birth must be in YYYY-MM-DD format.

passportExpiry.format: Primary Traveller Passport Expiry Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format.
passportExpiry.future: Primary Traveller Passport Expiry Date must be in the future.

whatsApp.min: WhatsApp Number seems too short (if provided).

email.invalid: Email must be a valid email.

tripCountries.max: Please select only one Country Travelling To.

ukraineDeparture.greater: Departure from Ukraine must be after Arrival in Ukraine.

tripCity.zoneTypeRequired: Zone type for city is required.

firstName.empty: Emergency Contact First Name is required.

phone.min: Emergency Contact Number seems too short.

medical.conditionsMin: Please list at least one pre-existing medical condition or uncheck the box.

consent.invalid: You must give consent to share medical info.

primaryRegionUkraine.required: Primary Region or Oblast is required.
primaryRegionUkraine.empty: Primary Region or Oblast cannot be empty.

validation.zoneDaysSum: The sum of Green, Amber, and Red Zone Days ({sumOfZoneDays}) must equal the Total Travel Days ({totalCalculatedDays}). Please adjust.
validation.coverageOr: Please select either Emergency Medical Coverage or Personal Accident (PA) Coverage, or both.

step1.consentForAdditionalTravellers: I confirm I have the traveler's consent to provide their personal information and purchase this membership on their behalf.
step1.purchaseContextOther: No, I am purchasing this membership for someone else.
step1.note: Note: When purchasing additional policies for other travelers, please ensure that travel dates and travel areas match those of the primary traveler. Travel dates and areas cannot differ between travelers within the same membership, as risk zones and coverage depend on consistent itineraries.If the travel dates or areas differ, a separate membership must be created.

summaryOfCoverage.title: Summary of Coverage
summaryOfCoverage.note: Note - pre existing medical condition will not be covered

consent.label: I consent to the sharing of my medical information in an emergency and authorize the collection, storage, and use of my personal information for that purpose.
